title: Can The Uptrend Continue for Marrone Bio Innovations (MBII)?
text: Content preferences Done Investors certainly have to be happy with Marrone Bio Innovations Inc MBII and its short term performance. After all, the stock has jumped by 86.7% in the past 4 weeks, and it is also above its 20 Day Simple Moving Average as well. This is certainly a good trend, but investors are probably asking themselves, can this positive trend continue for MBII? While we can never know for sure, it is pretty encouraging that estimates for MBII have moved higher in the past few weeks, meaning that analyst sentiment is moving in the right way. Plus, the stock actually has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), so the recent move higher for this spotlighted company may definitely continue over the next few weeks.
